mpic++    -std=c++11 -o3 -fopenmp -L/home/software/rhel6/gsl/1.15/lib -lgsl -lgslcblas -I/home/software/rhel6/gsl/1.15/include -lepetra -lamesos -laztecoo -lepetraext -ltriutils -lepetra -lteuchosremainder -lteuchosnumerics -lteuchoscomm -lteuchosparameterlist -lteuchoscore -I/usr/cac/rhel6/trilinos/12.0.1/include -L/usr/cac/rhel6/trilinos/12.0.1/lib -g   CMakeFiles/phoenix.dir/src/Check.cc.o CMakeFiles/phoenix.dir/src/FD_Vlasov.cc.o CMakeFiles/phoenix.dir/src/Timer.cc.o CMakeFiles/phoenix.dir/lib/pugixml.cpp.o CMakeFiles/phoenix.dir/main/Phoenix.cc.o  -o phoenix -rdynamic
